summary: A new standalone Follower based on Eretria the nomad rebel of the MTV tv serie
descriptionHtml:
[color=#f1c232][size=5]ERETRIA FOLLOWER[/size][/color]
[center]
[size=3]Eretria is a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
　You can use this mod with no problem whatever body types you're using.[/size]
[color=#cc0000]RACCOMANDED MOD - FACE LIGHT BY TKTK http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?[/color]
[color=#9900ff][size=4]
[Follower detail][/size][/color]

[size=3]Name : Eretria
Race : Breton
Level : 10 - No limit
Voice : Female Sultry
Body : UNP
Textures: Pride of Valhalla - Super HD Skin Set for UNP by Dracofish aka MelissaGT
(Midgard version)
Weight : 51
Default Armor : Karliah Armor 2 by Hentai (HD retexture by DragonAge7)
Default Weapon : Iron dagger.
Location : Sleeping Giant Inn, Riverwood
Combat Style : Assassin combat
She is Merriable and unkillable[/size]
[size=4]
